AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Adds parameters for the D3 Campaign Business Process.
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_D3CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS_PARAMETERS ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @NAME nvarchar(100) = '', @DESCRIPTION nvarchar(100) = '', @CAMPAIGNTYPE tinyint = '' ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_D3_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS (ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, CAMPAIGNTYPE, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @NAME, @DESCRIPTION, @CAMPAIGNTYPE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE)
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
